content.query:
SELECT
    --Top 100
    upper(SubscriptionName) as SubscriptionName
    ,upper(ResourceGroup) as ResourceGroup
    --,CostInBillingCurrency as Cost
    --,*
    ,ActiveWBS
    ,CostAllocationType
    ,sum(CostInBillingCurrency) as Cost
    --,*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost/20240201-20240229/Extended_v3_ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost_20240201-20240229.parquet/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where 
    --upper(ActiveWBS) <> 'C.TDI.IT.00010' and
    --upper(ActiveWBS) = 'E.RDI.10512' and
    upper(SubscriptionName) like 'S913-AURORA-NON-PRODUCTION'
    and lower(ResourceGroup) = 'mc_dev-aurora-ngrm-00_dev-aurora-ngrm-00_northeurope'
    group by  upper(SubscriptionName), upper(ResourceGroup), ActiveWBS, CostAllocationType
